metadata.description: IT'S HERE! The comic that blazed through Kickstarter during Black History Month 2016.  In a world that already hates and fears them -- what if only Black people had superpowers. After miraculously surviving being gunned down by police, a young man learns that he is part of the biggest lie in history. Now he must decide whether it's safer to keep it a secret or if the truth will set him free.
metadata.name: BLACK
